text_block_list.text:
I'd been feeling rough for a while now, with 
no signs of things getting any better.

It wasn't for lack of rest - I did as Manhattan Cafe asked, and 
went straight home after training every day, but…
choice_data_list: (It's the weekend, I should go somewhere!)
(It's the weekend, I should go somewhere!)

text_block_list.text:
Maybe I'd spent too long cooped up inside. Time to 
blow away the cobwebs! I opened the door and…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …Hello.

Manhattan Cafe was standing in the hallway! Just 
how long had she been waiting out there…?!
choice_data_list: Sorry! Were we going to do something today…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No… I just happened to be passing……

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: How about you, trainer-san? Are you going somewhere?
choice_data_list: Just thought I'd go out and get some air.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Um…… trainer-san…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Eh…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Yes…… 
Perhaps it's best if we stay together…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Very well. I'll come with you.

Since I had a companion, I thought it might be 
nice to go a little further afield. But where 
would Manhattan Cafe would like to go…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Here…?
choice_data_list:
That's right, the aquarium! 
You like the aquarium, right?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I do… it's just… 
It's… darker than I expected…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: We mustn't get separated… give me your hand…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Whatever you do… don't let go… 
Shall we…?

Manhattan Cafe and I held hands and made our way around. There 
were a lot of people that day, and a particularly big crowd had 
gathered in front of the big shark tank…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
It's… beautiful… 
And with this many people around, I think we should be…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Ah…!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No…! Trainer-san…!

Before I knew what was happening I was swept away by the crowd. 
I found myself in a dark corridor, alone. A maintenance corridor? 
Here, away from the exhibits, the silence was stark.

Maybe it was just the air conditioning, but I suddenly felt a 
cold sensation rising up my spine.
I made to leave, and…
(potch!)

Someone… or something… grabbed my ankles! I struggled, but it 
was no use… its grip was too strong!

text_block_list.name: Some…things? Voice
text_block_list.text: c̷o̸m̵e̴ ̸ ̷a̷n̵d̶ ̴ ̷p̷l̸a̴y̸
choice_data_list: (I've got a bad feeling about this…!)

text_block_list.text:
I could feel it pulling on me, pulling me back into the 
darkness… I looked down at my feet… and saw nothing but black…!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Stop it!!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san… 
You're alright…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: We… should go…

Emerging into the sunlight, I felt the warmth gradually return 
to my body. But just what had happened back there…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Do you feel… better now…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Good. 
I… don't think that will happen again. Not for a while, at least.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I'm… sorry. I let my guard down. Normally, if there are people 
around… that sort of thing doesn't happen…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But it seems that's no longer true.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Eventually… they will come for you again.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: It's… difficult to express…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But… this is not my friend. This is… another.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
They are… not good… Like a memory… or a scar… 
Seared… deeply… into this reality…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps it's better if we don't talk about them… 
Our interest could… excite them…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san… do you believe me?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Then… for now… be on your guard… 
Try to stay near other people…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Give me just a little more time…

Her face was deadly serious. It felt like 
I'd seen that expression a lot recently.
choice_data_list: It's a shame about our trip to the aquarium, though.
It's a shame about our trip to the aquarium, though.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
For now… it can't be helped… 
I need you to be patient.
choice_data_list: I hoped I could show you a nice time, but…
I hoped I could show you a nice time, but…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Eh…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Me…? 
I thought… it was you that wanted to go…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You did this…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
You put yourself in danger… just for me… 
Perhaps that's why…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
No… it's nothing… 
Trainer-san…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Let's come back again… 
after this is all over.

After that, I walked Manhattan Cafe back to her room. She barely 
looked up from the floor, so I couldn't read her expression.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You don't need to worry. I will…
I didn't know it then, but she had made up her mind what to do.
